metadata.title: CVE-2017-5489 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress before 4.7.1allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of unspecified victimsvia vectors involving a Flash file upload.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
